datasheet_name: Foetid Bloat-Drone with Heavy Blight Launcher

abilities.name: Explosive Blight
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, each time this model makes an attack that destroys an enemy unit, before removing the last model in that unit from play, roll a D6, adding 1 to the result if that unit is Afflicted: on a 5+, each enemy unit within 6" of that model is Afflicted until the start of your next turn.
